abstract: Los Angeles Police Chief Charlie Beck has provided city's Police Commission with formal recommendation that Officer Clifford Proctor face charges for fatal shooting of unarmed Venice homeless man Brendon Glenn in May 2015.

headline.print_headline: California: Charges Recommended for Officer Who Killed Homeless Man
headline.main: California: Charges Recommended for Officer Who Killed Homeless Man

keywords.value: Proctor, Clifford (Los Angeles, Calif, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons

snippet: Chief Charlie Beck of the Los Angeles police recommended that an officer face charges for fatally shooting an unarmed homeless man in Venice.
lead_paragraph: Chief Charlie Beck of the Los Angeles police recommended that an officer face charges for fatally shooting an unarmed homeless man in Venice.
